item.title: analyze packages imported by python project
item.description: import os import re def analyze_imports(project_path): imports = set() for root, dirs, files in os.walk(project_path): for file in files: if file.endswith(".py"): file_path = os.path.join(root, file) with open(file_path, "r") as f: lines = f.readlines() for line in lines: if line...
